      Subclasses of CollisionShape in com.flowpowered.react.collision.shape 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoxShape
      Represents a 3D box shape.
      class  CapsuleShape
      Represents a capsule collision shape that is defined around the Y axis.
      class  ConeShape
      Represents a cone collision shape centered at the origin and aligned with the Y axis.
      class  ConvexMeshShape
      This class represents a convex mesh shape.
      class  CylinderShape
      Represents a cylinder collision shape around the Y axis and centered at the origin.
      class  SphereShape
      Represents a sphere collision shape that is centered at the origin and defined by its radius.
